compatibility.notes: The BSD-2-Clause-first-lines license is a permissive license that allows code to be used in other projects without restrictions. It is compatible with most open-source licenses, including the MIT and Apache-2.0 licenses.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and disclaimer in source and binary forms
Retain the same conditions and disclaimer in redistributions
license.name: BSD-2-Clause-first-lines
obligations: Retain the copyright notice, this list of conditions and the disclaimer as the first lines of this file unmodified.
Reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
